description: In life, there are many lessons to be learned…Lessons found not by hitting the books, but by hitting some fine ass. A good teacher needs to be very flexible when instructing her students on educational values, especially when her star pupil ask to be taught how to pleasure his girlfriend so she can achieve ecstasy. It takes a mature woman to give a lesson in seduction; and class is now in session.
title: Lessons in Seduction 1
